page.title: 12HUMBIE SEVENTY YEARS AGO.
page.content: MURIEL'S GRANDAD CAME TO THIS SCHOOL SEVENTY YEARS AGO.HE HAD TO WALK FOUR MILES.HIS FAVOURITE SUBJECT WAS ARITHMETIC.THERE WERE TWO TEACHERS AND ABOUT SEVENTY PUPILS.THE FURNITURE WAS WOODEN AND TWO PEOPLE SAT TOGETHER. THEY GOT THEIR HEADS KNOCKED TOGETHER FOR BEING LATE OR FOR SPEAKING.THE BUILDING WAS HEATED BY HOT WATER PIPES AND LIT BY PARAFIN LAMPS.THEY ATTENDED SCHOOL FROM FIVE TO FOURTEEN YEARS. THEY PLAYED FOOTBALL AND ROUNDERS IN THE PLAYGROUND AND INSTEAD OF GYM DID DRILL THERE TOO.AT BREAK HE ATE A JAM PIECE WHICH HE BROUGHT WITH HIM.THERE WAS A SOUP KITCHEN WHERE THE POST OFFICE HOUSE IS AND THEY HAD LUNCH THERE. WHEN WRITING HE WOULD HAVE USED A SLATE BUT HE ALSO HAD JOTTERS.HE LIKED SCHOOL BUT WAS FRIGHTENED OF HIS TEACHERS.
